Author: TheShortGerman
Text: I’ve gotten so blatantly obvious in this relapse since it’s my first serious one as an adult. I even asked my mom for 00 jeans for Christmas since none of my bigger ones fit anymore. It is so obvious I’m disordered but my family won’t call me out on it, and I’m an adult so it doesn’t matter much now. If they asked or ever expressed concern for me, I would just be honest and say eating gives me anxiety and that’s why I’ve gotten so skinny.
